about_the_game:
Enemy forces occupy your home and you decide to fight back. You want to join the resistance, but you're not a fighter, you're just a guy with a knack for technology. But there are other ways to turn a drone enhusiast like yourself into a guerilla fighter.

- Modify civilian drones into deadly weapons using homemade gadgets and military equipment

- Explore the map looking for enemy bases, ammo warehouses, and logistic hubs

- Watch out for radars and patrols able to locate and destroy your drone

- Use the environment to your advantage, and look for opportunities to maximize damage to enemy forces.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel® i5-2500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750Ti 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound card
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change during the development of the game.

short_description: Drone Operator is a game where you will use civilian drones to conduct military operations against an overwhelming occupying force. Use your technical skills to turn harmless flying toys into deadly weapons, and outsmart your enemy. But remember - stay vigilant.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
